00017   public:

00019     enum BatteryStatus {
00020       BATTERY_STATUS_UNKNOWN = 1,
00021       BATTERY_STATUS_CHARGING,
00022       BATTERY_STATUS_DISCHARGING,

00030       BATTERY_HEALTH_UNKNOWN = 1,
00031       BATTERY_HEALTH_GOOD,
00032       BATTERY_HEALTH_OVERHEAT,
00033       BATTERY_HEALTH_DEAD,
00034       BATTERY_HEALTH_OVER_VOLTAGE,
00035       BATTERY_HEALTH_UNSPECIFIED_FAILURE,
00036       BATTERY_HEALTH_COLD
00037     };
00038 
00039     // values of the "plugged" field in the ACTION_BATTERY_CHANGED intent.
00040     // These must be powers of 2.
00041     enum BatteryPlugged {
00042         BATTERY_PLUGGED_AC = 1,  
00043         BATTERY_PLUGGED_USB  
00044     };
